english.segment1: Separated until the veil was torn. The moment that hope was born. and guilt was pardoned once and for all
english.segment2: Captivated but no longer bound by chains. left at an empty grave. the sinner and the sacred resolved
english.segment3: [chorus:]. and all of creation sing with me now. lift up your voice and lay your burden down. and all of creation sing with me now. fill up the heavens let his glory resound
english.segment4: Time has faded and we see him face to face. every doubt erased forever we will worship the king
english.segment7: the reason we breathe is to sing of his glory. and for all he has done praise the father praise the son and the spirit in one
english.segment9: and every knee will bow oh and every tongue praise the father praise the son and the spirit in one
